item.title: Well Hello, World!
item.description: puts "What a classic stereotype!" ðŸ¥‘ Appetizer Hello, there! Welcome aboard! Welcome to this (super simple) blog. Here, I will be sharing some tutorials, tips, or just some info related to techs, films, music, designs, and anything that pops from my mind. Why am I doing this? Simple, as they said: “The best way to learn is to teach”. I think it’s cool if I can share my knowledge. I think it’s amazing if others can benefit from what I know.
